question_text: Which of the following statements about DNS subdomains are correct? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Subdomains inherit the structure from their parent domains
Subdomains must always resolve to a different IP than the parent domain
Subdomains increase flexibility in DNS and service organization
Subdomains are resolved independently of the FQDN structure
Subdomains can be nested multiple levels deep
correct_answer: Subdomains inherit the structure from their parent domains
Subdomains increase flexibility in DNS and service organization
Subdomains can be nested multiple levels deep
explanation: Subdomains expand DNS structure by enabling hierarchical service names, often nested deeply for internal use or load segmentation.
